survey_name: Campus Food Truck Vendor Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess student and staff satisfaction with food truck vendors on campus, focusing on food quality, variety, pricing, and service efficiency.

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase from food trucks on campus?
questions.client_notes: Ensure the options cover a broad range of frequencies to capture varied usage patterns.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question.

script.question_text: How often do you purchase from food trucks on campus?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when choosing a food truck? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Only respondents who answered 'Daily', '2-3 times per week', or 'Once a week' to Q1
questions.client_notes: This multi-choice question helps identify priority areas for vendors to focus on.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select options with a max selection limit of 3.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when choosing a food truck? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: Only respondents who answered 'Daily', '2-3 times per week', or 'Once a week' to Q1

questions.question_text: How would you rate the overall quality of food from campus food trucks?
questions.routing_logic: Only respondents who answered 'Daily', '2-3 times per week', or 'Once a week' to Q1
questions.client_notes: A standard Likert scale is used here for consistent feedback on food quality.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio button with the above options.

script.question_text: How would you rate the overall quality of food from campus food trucks?
script.routing_logic: Only respondents who answered 'Daily', '2-3 times per week', or 'Once a week' to Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for campus food truck vendors?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended responses can provide qualitative insights for vendors.
questions.scripter_notes: Use an open-text field for free-form responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for campus food truck vendors?
